comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of regular sandwiches made
- y: number of special sandwiches made

Definitions:
- x: non-negative integer
- y: non-negative integer

Constraints:
- 2x + 3y \leq 40 (Eggs constraint)
- 3x + 5y \leq 70 (Bacon constraint)
- x \geq 0 (Non-negativity constraint for regular sandwiches)
- y \geq 0 (Non-negativity constraint for special sandwiches)

Objective:
- Maximize 3x + 4y (Profit objective)
